Package org.reprap.geometry.polygons

Class Summary
AllSTLsToBuild This class holds a list of STLObjects that represents everything that is to be built.
BooleanGrid  
BooleanGridList Class to hold a list of BooleanGrids with associated atributes for each
chPair chPair - small class to hold double pointers for convex hull calculations.
PolPoint Small class to hold a polygon index and the index of a point within it
Rr2Point Class for (x, y) points and vectors
RrCircle Small class to hold circles (centre and squared radius)
RrCSG RepRap Constructive Solid Geometry class RrCSG: 2D polygons as boolean combinations of half-planes First version 14 November 2005
RrHalfPlane Class to hold and manipulate linear half-planes
RrInterval Real 1D intervals
RrLine Class to hold and manipulate parametric lines
RrPolygon The main boundary-representation polygon class
RrPolygonList RrPolygonList: A collection of 2D polygons List of polygons class.
RrRectangle A 2D box is an X and a Y interval
treeList tree - class to hold lists to build a containment tree (that is a representation of which polygon is inside which, like a Venn diagram).
 

Enum Summary
RrCSGOp Set operators, operands, and the universal and null sets
 

Exception Summary
RrParallelLineException Exception for when trying to intersect parallel lines
